## ResourceManagerBuilder.conditions property

A [ConditionCollector](./ts-res.conditions.conditioncollector.md) which contains the [conditions](./ts-res.conditions.condition.md) used so far by the [resource candidates](./ts-res.resources.resourcecandidate.md) in this manager.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get conditions(): ReadOnlyConditionCollector;
```
